One time, I put on the hat of a tech lead. It was like being a Swiss Army knife in the tech world ‚Äì I got to play with VR, mobile apps, and web stuff. I believe in learning by doing, kind of like DIY but with codes and algorithms.

Outside coding, I‚Äôm pretty much curious about everything. I mess around with little experiments - electronics, trying to grow stuff (fingers crossed, plants!), and fiddling with my schedule to make the most out of my day.

What‚Äôs my deal? Well, I really value being open, honest, and having a chat that can solve problems.
